biography:
​From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.  

Toshiyuki Nagashima (永島敏行 Nagashima Toshiyuki, born 21 October 1956 in Chiba, Japan)  is a Japanese actor and entrepreneur. He won the award for best actor at the 6th Hochi Film Award for Enrai.

name: Toshiyuki Nagashima
